alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 11:31PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln and central Custer Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Anselmo to near Comstock. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and up to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Callaway, Sargent, Ansley, Merna, Anselmo, Comstock, Berwyn, Weissert, Westerville, Lillian, Round Valley, Walworth, Milldale, Arcadia Wescott, Lodi, Pleasant Hill and Big Oak Canyon. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 86 and 117. Highway 2 between mile markers 255 and 299. Highway 92 between mile markers 258 and 308. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
